response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. This unique item is not just a possession but a testament to craftsmanship and dedication. I understand that its true worth may be subjective, yet I believe it could significantly impact your life positively. I am offering this product to you at a special price of $750,000. This offer reflects my desire to share its significance with someone who appreciates its true essence. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you're interested in making an offer based on its value to you. I look forward to your response.", "product_price": 750000}
